plugins.name: resume-helper
plugins.description: Adversarial multi-agent resume development - creates compelling AND honest resumes

plugins.name: bon-cop-bad-cop
plugins.description: Three-agent adversarial TDD loop: Test Writer (bad cop), Code Writer (suspect), and Reviewer (good cop) work together while keeping each other honest

plugins.name: chess
plugins.description: AI chess opponent using three-agent deliberation system with genuine information isolation. Strategist proposes moves, Devil's Advocate critiques, Arbiter decides.

plugins.name: brainstorm
plugins.description: Creative brainstorming partner for generating ideas, exploring possibilities, and divergent thinking. Transforms Claude from solution-finder into thought partner.

plugins.name: prd
plugins.description: Product Requirements Document generator. Transforms brainstorm ideas into complete, professional PRDs with interactive section-by-section refinement.
